subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Running back Jesse Chatman became the fifth unrestricted free agent to sign with the Jets in the past two weeks. Chatman, 28, who will join Thomas Jones in the Jets’ backfield, had career highs of 515 yards rushing and 276 receiving yards for the Miami Dolphins last season, his fifth in the N.F.L.
